AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: destination to pick up commercial equipment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer, Texas: location where an immigration checkpoint is situated and a stop occurred, also involved in a search of a tractor-trailer and prolonged stops, and where conflicting evidence about a Bluetooth was presented, discovered ten undocumented aliens hidden in a tractor-trailer, site of a Border Patrol checkpoint where Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams were stopped
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where aliens entered or remained in violation of the law
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court where jury trial, sentencing, and review of minor-role arguments took place, denied Raymond McMillon's motion to suppress evidence, made factual findings regarding the search and consent, and heard motions to dismiss on speedy trial grounds, also responsible for ruling on pretrial motions within thirty excludable days, makes 'ends-of-justice' findings on the record, correctly concluded that less than seventy non-excludable days elapsed between Raymond McMillon's indictment and trial, and clearly articulated its reasoning for denying Raymond McMillon's § 3B1.2 request
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Supreme Court: recognized the constitutionality of suspicionless routine vehicle stops at immigration checkpoints for the limited purpose of ascertaining occupants' citizenship
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court record: record of the case where ends-of-justice findings are set forth, includes events that occurred off the record, contains canine records for in camera inspection
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.speedy trial case: case where speedy trial determinations are reviewed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: federal law regulating the time between indictment and trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court of Appeals for the F: federal appeals court that has jurisdiction over cases from Texas and other states, and has ruled on matters related to smuggling and conspiracy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.suppression hearing: hearing where the voluntariness of Zeba Williams' consent to search was determined
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court's docket: official record of the district court's proceedings, includes formal notations of events and submissions
